backend/main.mo: Motoko backend handling user profile access with authorization checks plus public contact-form submissions stored with timestamps and admin-only retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping WhatsApp‑related requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all major frontend files, pages, components, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark themes, and global utility resets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Router setup defining root layout and routes for Home, Services, About, Pricing, and Contact pages.
frontend/src/components/forms/Internatio: Country‑select phone input combining dial codes with user‑typed numbers using UI select and input components.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with branding, navigation links, contact info, and dynamic year and attribution data.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive header with logo, navigation links, and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper including header, footer, and routed content area.
frontend/src/components/marketing/CtaBlo: Centered call-to-action block with title, description, and primary/secondary buttons.
frontend/src/components/marketing/FaqAcc: Expandable FAQ list with toggleable answers and animated icons.
frontend/src/components/marketing/IconBu: Grid of benefit items each with an icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/marketing/PlanCa: Pricing plan card showing details, features, and a CTA, with optional 'most popular' styling.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Proble: Grid of highlighted business problems displayed with destructive-styled icons.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Card describing a service with sections for what it is, why it matters, and business impact.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Social: Section showing testimonials and a case study with before/after metrics.
frontend/src/components/marketing/ThreeS: Three‑step process explaining lead capture, automation, and conversion.
frontend/src/components/marketing/ValueP: Grid of core value items with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Whatsa: WhatsApp CTA button linking to a configured chat URL.
frontend/src/config/site.ts: Defines marketing site metadata including name, description, WhatsApp numbers, contact info, and CTA labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactForm.ts: Provides a mutation for submitting contact form data through the actor and tracks submission state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, loading, login, logout, and identity state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future query hooks using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for colors, themes, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission details, value props, and marketing sections using siteConfig.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, submission via actor, and optional WhatsApp follow‑up link.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with hero section, benefits, pricing plans, and various marketing components.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Renders the pricing page with three plan tiers and an ROI benefits section using PlanCard components. Most logic defines static plan/ROI data and displays them in styled sections.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays a list of service offerings with descriptions and business impact using ServiceCard components. Contains static structured service data and a styled hero section.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters, including support for hash-based routing and sessionStorage. Includes logic to prioritize URL values and sanitize the address bar.
frontend/src/utils/whatsappLink.ts: Generates a normalized WhatsApp deep link by cleaning the phone number and URL-encoding the message text.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, and responsive container settings, and loading typography, container-queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining current features, new WhatsApp integration request, and state tracking for routing contact-form details to specific WhatsApp numbers.
